en.title: Guidebook for Financial Inclusion
en.description: Frameworks and activities that can be used by financial institutions to understand barriers and create more inclusive financial offerings.
en.author: Inclusive Design Research Centre

fr.title: Guide pour l'inclusion financière
fr.description: Cadres et activités que les institutions financières peuvent utiliser pour comprendre les obstacles et créer des offres financières plus inclusives.
fr.author: Inclusive Design Research Centre
